function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of misinformation and fake news related to contagious diseases (e.g., COVID-19)","Impact":"Increased feelings of unrest, xenophobia, and potential harmful behavior among citizens","Mitigation":"Implementation of a public blockchain network for information sharing and digital signatures for message initiators","Technologies":"Public blockchain networks, digital signature technology","People":"Citizens, authorities, individuals who are susceptible to misinformation","Owner":"Government authorities, social platform administrators"},{"Description":"Incentivizing volunteer participation using blockchain technology","Impact":"Incentives may lead to biased or incorrect information dissemination, potential misuse of incentives for spreading misinformation","Mitigation":"Robust consensus mechanisms and secure distribution methods for incentives","Technologies":"Consensus mechanisms in blockchain, secure incentive distribution systems","People":"Volunteers, organizations, individuals involved in rewarding volunteers","Owner":"Organizations, volunteer programs"}]}
